lps.pr1
Class Command

java.lang.Object
  lps.pr1.Command

public class Command
extends java.lang.Object

A command contains the information parsed from the input when the player interacts with the game. This class encapsulates a Verb and a Direction (if the Verb is MOVE)

Field Summary
protected  Parser.Direction dir
          Last direction parsed from the input stream
protected  Parser.Verb verb
          Last verb parsed from the scanner
